channel.title: CVE Feed for Alkacon -- Open CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alkacon -- Open CMS

item.title: CVE-2023-6380|2024-08-28T13:44:40.334Z -- alkacon -- open%20cms
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability has been found in the Open CMS product affecting versions 14 and 15 of the 'Mercury' template. An attacker could create a specially crafted URL and send it to a specific user to redirect them to a malicious site and compromise them. Exploitation of this vulnerability is possible due to the fact that there is no proper sanitization of the 'URI' parameter.
